description: 「Mian bo」 alone means meager or humble. It is a humble way to refer to one's own efforts or contribution.

examples.chinese: 我一定会贡献出我的绵薄之力的
examples.translation: I will definitely contribute my modest efforts.

examples.chinese: 愿尽绵薄之力,继续捐赠
examples.translation: I wish to do my meager part and continue donating.

examples.chinese: 希望在有需要的时候为你尽一点绵薄之力
examples.translation: I hope to offer my humble assistance when you need it.
